traits.name: Draconic Ancestry
traits.description: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the dragon type chosen.

traits.name: Breath Weapon
traits.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your draconic ancestry determines the size, shape, and damage type of the exhalation.

traits.name: Damage Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

traits.name: Acid Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Acid)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals acid damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Lightning Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to lightning damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Lightning)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals lightning damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Fire)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals fire damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Lightning Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to lightning damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Lightning)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals lightning damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Acid Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to acid damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Acid)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals acid damage in a 5 by 30 ft. line.

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Fire)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals fire damage in a 15 ft. cone.

traits.name: Poison Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to poison damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Poison)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals fire damage in a 15 ft. cone.

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Fire)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals fire damage in a 15 ft. cone.

traits.name: Cold Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to cold damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Cold)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals cold damage in a 15 ft. cone.

traits.name: Cold Resistance
traits.description: You have resistance to cold damage.

traits.name: Breath Weapon (Cold)
traits.description: Your breath weapon deals cold damage in a 15 ft. cone.

name: Human
languages: One extra language of your choice

traits.name: Versatile
traits.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

traits.name: Extra Feat
traits.description: You gain one extra feat of your choice at 1st level.

traits.name: Bonus Feat
traits.description: You gain one extra feat of your choice at 1st level.

traits.name: Determination
traits.description: Once per short rest, you can reroll an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: 60ft darkvision

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against poison, and resistance against poison damage

traits.name: Stonecunning
traits.description: You have advantage on Intelligence (History) checks related to the origin of stonework.

traits.name: Dwarven Toughness
traits.description: Your hit point maximum increases by 1, and it increases by 1 every time you gain a level.

traits.name: Dwarven Armor Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

traits.name: Superior Darkvision
traits.description: 120ft darkvision

traits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
traits.description: Disadvantage on attack rolls and Perception checks in sunlight

traits.name: Duergar Resilience
traits.description: Advantage on saving throws against illusions, paralysis, and poison, and resistance against poison damage

traits.name: Duergar Magic
traits.description: At 3rd level, you can cast the Enlarge/Reduce spell on yourself once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast the Invisibility spell on yourself once per long rest.

traits.name: Dwarven Armor Training
traits.description: You have proficiency with light and medium armor.

traits.name: Mark of Warding Spells
traits.description: You know the Alarm and Mage Armor spells, and can cast them using spell slots once per long rest each.

traits.name: Warder's Intuition
traits.description: When you make an Intelligence (Investigation) check or an ability check using thieves' tools, you can roll a d4 and add the number rolled to the ability check.
